include/ulib/ssl/digest.h

00001 // ============================================================================
00002 //
00003 // = LIBRARY
00004 //    ulib - c++ library
00005 //
00006 // = FILENAME
00007 //    digest.h - interface to MD5
00008 //
00009 // = AUTHOR
00010 //    Stefano Casazza
00011 //
00012 // ============================================================================
00013 
00014 #ifndef U_DIGEST_H
00015 #define U_DIGEST_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/string.h>
00018 
00019 #include <openssl/md5.h>
00020 
00021 // MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH == 16
00022 
00023 struct UDigest {
00024 
00025         static UString md5(const UString& data)
00026                 {
00027                 U_TRACE(1, "UDigest::md5(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(data))
00028 
00029                 MD5_CTX ctx;
00030                 UString output(MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00031 
00032                 output.size_adjust(MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00033 
00034 #  ifdef HAVE_OPENSSL_97
00035                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Init,   "%p",       &ctx);
00036                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, U_STRING_TO_PARAM(data));
00037                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Final,  "%p,%p", (unsigned char*)output.data(), &ctx);
00038 #  else
00039                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Init,   "%p",       &ctx);
00040                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, U_STRING_TO_PARAM(data));
00041                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Final,  "%p,%p", (unsigned char*)output.data(), &ctx);
00042 #  endif
00043 
00044                 U_RETURN_STRING(output);
00045                 }
00046 
00047         static UString hmac(const UString& data, const UString& password)
00048                 {
00049                 U_TRACE(1, "UDigest::hmac(%.*S,%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(data), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(password))
00050 
00051                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(password.size(), MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH)
00052 
00053                 MD5_CTX ctx;
00054                 UString output(MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00055                 const void* ptr = password.data();
00056 
00057                 output.size_adjust(MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00058 
00059 #  ifdef HAVE_OPENSSL_97
00060                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Init,   "%p",       &ctx);
00061                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, ptr, MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00062                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, U_STRING_TO_PARAM(data));
00063                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, ptr, MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00064                 (void) U_SYSCALL(MD5_Final,  "%p,%p", (unsigned char*)output.data(), &ctx);
00065 #  else
00066                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Init,   "%p",       &ctx);
00067                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, ptr, MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00068                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, U_STRING_TO_PARAM(data));
00069                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Update, "%p,%p,%d", &ctx, ptr, MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH);
00070                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(  MD5_Final,  "%p,%p", (unsigned char*)output.data(), &ctx);
00071 #  endif
00072 
00073                 U_RETURN_STRING(output);
00074                 }
00075 };
00076 
00077 #endif
